TurnStarted.Description:
When a character starts their turn within the kinetic aura of an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.X11Y3T1IzmtNqGMV]{Air Gate} kineticist with its aura junction, grant that character the corresponding bonus to their Speeds via an auxiliary effect until the end of their turn.

This benefit overlaps with the system's effect when inside the aura, but persists once the character leaves the aura until the end of their turn.

AttackRolled.Description: When a character with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BEgz2GnG2MKmmaZX]{Aldori Swordlord} feat hits or critically hits with an attack using an aldori dueling sword, they receive the corresponding number of temporary Hit Points.

DamageTaken.Description: Automatically remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Or6RLXeoZkN8CLdi]{Amulet's Abeyance} effect after damage is taken.

TurnEnded.Description: When a champion with Aura of Courage ends their turn, all allies within their aura reduce their frightened condition by 1.

RollItemDamage.Description: Roll item damage with context provided by the parent trigger.

SendAbilityToChat.Addendum: If you have PF2e Toolbelt's Target Helper feature enabled, the message will have the triggering creature as its target.
SendAbilityToChat.Description: Send an ability to chat. The ability's slug and its origin are set in the parent trigger.

DamageTaken.Description: When a character with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DYUlMxh7TDgEh9xB]{Brutal Beating} deals critical hit damage to a target, that target becomes frightened 1.

Automatically remove the Champion's Resistance effect after damage is taken.

If the origin champion has the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.UyuwFp0jQqYL2AdF]{Redemption} cause, the damage origin also becomes enfeebled until the end of its next turn. If they have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2c9awqDem5OLK47S]{Weight of Guilt} feat, the champion can choose whether to apply the stupefied or enfeebled conditions.

AwaitConfirmation.Prompt: Will you use Weight of Guilt to make the enemy stupefied rather than enfeebled?
AwaitConfirmation.Title: Weight of Guilt

Description.Bow: When critical damage is dealt with a weapon in the bow group and the origin has its critical specialization effect, add the immobilized condition to the target.
Description.Spear: When critical damage is dealt with a weapon in the spear group and the origin has its critical specialization effect, add the clumsy condition to the target until the start of the origin's turn. If the weapon has the grievous rune, the effect lasts for an additional round.
Description.Sword: When critical damage is dealt with a weapon in the sword group and the origin has its critical specialization effect, add the off-guard condition to the target until the start of the origin's turn. If the weapon has the grievous rune, the effect lasts until the end of the origin's turn instead.

AuraEntered.Description:
Roll a kineticist's Crowned in Tempest's Fury damage when a creature enters their kinetic aura.

If you have Safe Elements, you can designate a party member to be unaffected by this trigger by dragging the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.p4SCBtIYPzVQ0gEd]{Aux Effect: Safe Elements} effect onto them from the kineticist's sheet.

TurnEnded.Description:
Roll a kineticist's Crowned in Tempest's Fury damage when a creature end its turn in their kinetic aura.

If you have Safe Elements, you can designate a party member to be unaffected by this trigger by dragging the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.p4SCBtIYPzVQ0gEd]{Aux Effect: Safe Elements} effect onto them from the kineticist's sheet.

AttackRolled.Description: When a character critically hits and their weapon has a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JY8X4RSfg6xIqAC9]{Crushing} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.t6SSQYruLsDWj5Tl]{Greater Crushing} rune, their target becomes clumsy and enfeebled.

CombatantJoined.Description: When a character that is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cYtYKa1gDEl7y2N0]{Defending} joins a combat, raise their shield.

TurnStarted.Description: When a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cYtYKa1gDEl7y2N0]{Defending} character starts their first turn with their shield raised, remove that effect.

AuraEntered.Description:
When a character enters a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wjJW9hWY5CkkMvY5]{Diamond Dust} aura, roll its damage and add an effect to make the character immune to further instances of this trigger.

For this trigger to work, the spellcaster must have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.fyKmMJganeNRIVWi]{Aux Effect: Diamond Dust} applied to them, dragged from the spell when posted to chat. Link this effect in the spell's description.

TurnEnded.Description:
When a character ends their turn inside a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wjJW9hWY5CkkMvY5]{Diamond Dust} aura, roll its damage. If a character has the immunity effect added by the Aura Entered trigger, remove that effect.

For this trigger to work, the spellcaster must have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.fyKmMJganeNRIVWi]{Aux Effect: Diamond Dust} applied to them, dragged from the spell when posted to chat. Link this effect in the spell's description.

AttackRolled.Description:
When a character with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQrhDpLIp9zjbjEP]{Distracting Shot} critically hits their hunted prey, or if they hit their hunted prey twice in the same turn, that target becomes off-guard until the start of the triggering character's next turn.

If the character has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vDJRIKS27md3LudA]{Greater Distracting Shot}, this effect lasts until the end of their next turn instead, and their hunted prey becomes off-guard until the start of their next turn on a hit.

TurnEnded.Description: When a non-immune living character ends their turn in a Dread Flickering aura, send the ability to chat alongside an immunity auxiliary effect to be applied in the event of a critically successful save.

AttackRolled.Description: When an attack critically misses against a target benefitting from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.C5tSxOwDILefw4zq]{Elegant Buckler}, that target gains panache until the end of their next turn.

DamageTaken.Description: Remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.eG1fBodYwolaXK98]{Enduring Might}'s effect when damage is taken.

AttackRolled.Description: If the attacker has the Energy Shot auxiliary effect, deplete the Energy Shots resource by 1 after attacking with a crossbow or firearm. If there are no more Energy Shots left, remove the effect automatically.

CombatantJoined.Description: After confirming that Energy Shot is used, add its damage effect as well as an auxiliary effect to automatically track the shots as a Special Resource.
CombatantJoined.Prompt: Are you using Energy Shot in this combat?

TurnEnded.Description: When a creature that is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.zU3Ovaet4xQ5Gmvy]{Engulfed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.uJSseLa57HZYSMUu]{Swallowed Whole} ends their turn, roll that ability's damage.

AttackRolled.Description: When an attack misses against a target benefitting from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.WcY7H7mRiK2VDquV]{Extravagant Parry}, that target gains panache until the end of their next turn.

When a character critically hits and their weapon has a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.P6v2AtJw7AUwaDzf]{Fearsome} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.uz3JCjRvkE44jxMd]{Greater Fearsome} rune, their target becomes frightened 1 or 2, respectively.

DamageTaken.Description: When a creature is brought to 0 Hit Points from a finisher, if the damage origin has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DY6pNO3GzHeKSxmQ]{Finishing Follow-Through}, it gains panache.
Remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.y7Tusv3CieZktkkV]{Flame Barrier}'s effect when damage is taken.

AttackRolled.Description: When an attack misses against a target benefitting from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TnYHtN9gQASqOnii]{Flashy Dodge}, that target gains panache until the end of their next turn.

AttackRolled.CreateChatMessage: Trigger Trove Note On a success, this critical hit becomes a normal hit thanks to your fortification rune!
AttackRolled.Description: When a character whose armor has a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8buhFcGwuaJRrp0y]{Fortification} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ujWnpVMkbTljMGN9]{Greater Fortification} rune etched onto it is critically hit, roll a flat check with the appropriate DC.

Description.All: Post the Frightful Presence ability to chat when a creature enters the aura. If you have Frightful Presence (Aura Entered, Enemies Only) enabled, disable this one.
Description.EnemiesOnly: Post the Frightful Presence ability to chat when an enemy of the Frightful Presence creature enters the aura. If you have Frightful Presence (Aura Entered) enabled, disable this one.

Addendum.CriticalSuccess: If the triggering character critically succeeds, you can apply this effect to make them immune.
Addendum.Success: If the triggering character succeeds, you can apply this effect to make them immune.

TurnStarted.Description: When a non-immune creature begins its turn within the gibbering aura, send the ability to chat alongside an auxiliary effect to apply immunity.

TokenMoved.Description: When an allied token is moved to an adjacent space of another token with Goblin Scuttle, confirm whether they want to use it, and if so, send the feat to chat. Be aware of false positives resulting from a Foundry movement not being the same as having ended a move action.
TokenMoved.Prompt: Your ally has moved into an adjacent space, possibly ending their move action there. Do you want to use Goblin Scuttle?

DamageTaken.Description: Roll persistent fire damage each time a creature within an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AspA30tzKCHFWRf0]{Incendiary Aura} takes damage. This trigger cannot distinguish between damage types, so it's up to the user to apply it only when the triggering creature takes fire damage.
DamageTaken.Note: If a creature within the emanation takes fire damage, it catches on fire, taking persistent fire damage.

AuraEntered.Description: Post the Intense Heat ability to chat when a creature enters the aura.

TurnStarted.Description: Post the Intense Heat ability to chat when a creature starts their turn in the aura.

AttackRolled.Description: When a creature with Inviolable is hit, roll 3d6 spirit damage. If they are holy or unholy, the damage has the corresponding trait.

DamageTaken.Description:
If a character with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.q1iP3SjAF5uceI0M]{Martial Performance} deals damage to an enemy, and they are under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{Courageous Anthem}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{Rallying Anthem}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Xxdwkt0EEDgP1LGc]{Song of Strength}; the duration of these effects is extended by 1 round.

Then, an effect is added that prevents extended effects from benefitting again.

For this trigger to work correctly, the composition effect must have been dragged from the triggering character's chat card.

AttackRolled.Description:
If the attacked creature has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.pnSHABS9FZvExLa9]{Aux Effect: Mirror Image}, automatically reduce the Mirror Images resource depending on both the outcome of the attack and a randomly generated number, as described by the spell.

It's recommended that the auxiliary effect is added to the spell's description for easy access, and used instead of the system-provided effect.

Note.Hit: Mirror Image The attack hits you! All your mirror images remain.
Note.Miss: Mirror Image The attack misses you! One of your mirror images is destroyed.

AttackRolled.Description:
Reduce the duration of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Mountain Resilience}'s effect by 1 minute each time the beneficiary of the spell is hit by an attack that deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.

Note: Due to a current limitation, this trigger will only work when the primary damage type is bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing. This covers most cases, but be aware that some instances of the previously mentioned damage types will be missed.

Roll @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.BA143r8fCqmSjdRf]{Nettleskin}'s damage when the recipient of the spell is hit with an unarmed attack, or a melee attack by an adjacent attacker.

For this trigger to work, the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.QrCwY1ylvvuzW7mb]{Aux Effect: Nettleskin} must be dragged onto the recipient. Furthermore, it must be dragged from the spell's card in chat, otherwise it won't have the correct scaling.

CombatantJoined.Description: After confirming that One Shot, One Kill is used, add an effect that enables its additional precision damage until the first successful Strike deals damage.
CombatantJoined.Prompt: Are you using One Shot, One Kill in this combat?

DamageTaken.Description: Remove the One Shot, One Kill auxiliary effect when an enemy takes damage from a character benefitting from that ability.
Automatically remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rMOI8JFJ0nT2mrCF]{Phase Familiar}'s effect after damage is taken
Automatically remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6sNjsNPipZvQ3BGe]{Rapid Retreat}'s effect after damage is taken.

AuraLeft.Description: Remove the Ravel of Thorns penalty when a creature leaves the kineticist's kinetic aura.

TurnStarted.Description: When a creature starts its turn inside the kinetic aura of a character in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.mHvkBdBN4gs6CH1g]{Ravel of Thorns} stance, add the Ravel of Thorns auxiliary effect.

TurnEnded.Description: When a character with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.3eRkOQa7h1MWmzBh]{Initiate Benefit (Regalia)} ends their turn, reduce the frightened value of all frightened allies within their inspiring aura by 1.

DamageTaken.Description: If the damage origin has Replenishment of War and its damage comes from a Strike with its deity's favored weapon, then grant Replenishment of War's temporary Hit Points appropriate for the outcome of the Strike. If the damage origin has Shared Replenishment, this trigger will be disabled.

AttackRolled.Description: When a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.83zzG4XBiL5I3NZv]{Revitalizing Finisher} hits, the origin creature and all allies within 30 feet of it gain temporary Hit Points equal to half the origin's level. On a failure, only the origin gains this benefit.

DescriptionOverride.Basic: The attack target becomes immobilized ([[/act escape dc=23]]) and clumsy 1 for as long as the immobilization lasts.
DescriptionOverride.Greater: The attack target becomes immobilized ([[/act escape dc=28]]) and clumsy 1 for as long as the immobilization lasts.
DescriptionOverride.Major: The attack target becomes immobilized ([[/act escape dc=34]]) and clumsy 1 for as long as the immobilization lasts.
DescriptionOverride.True: The attack target becomes immobilized ([[/act escape dc=41]]) and clumsy 1 for as long as the immobilization lasts.

AttackRolled.Description: When a character critically hits and their weapon has a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.yGgsoSA8EaaEsYZn]{Rooting} rune, their target becomes immobilized and clumsy.

Check.Addendum: A creature can be unaffected by this trigger by dragging the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.p4SCBtIYPzVQ0gEd]{Aux Effect: Safe Elements} effect onto them from the kineticist's sheet.

AwaitConfirmation.Prompt: An opponent critically hits you with an attack that deals physical damage. Will you use Scars of Steel?

AttackRolled.Description: When a raging character is critically hit by an attack that deals physical damage, and that character has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.j8ycCi7ghTtpRjEW]{Scars of Steel} with available uses left, confirm whether they will use the ability and add an auxiliary effect that enables its resistance if so.

DamageTaken.Description: When a character with the auxiliary effect given by the Scars of Steel (Attack Rolled) trigger takes physical damage, remove that auxiliary effect.

CombatantJoined.Description: When a character that is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.kV3XM0YJeS2KCSOb]{Scouting} joins combat, add its effect to all allied scene tokens. If the character has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.aFoVHsuInMOkTZoQ]{Incredible Scout}, its effect will be given instead.

AwaitConfirmation.Prompt: Will you use Scout's Warning? You must roll a Perception, Stealth, or Survival check for initiative.

CombatantJoined.Description: A character with Scout's Warning can confirm whether they will use that feat. If they will, its effect will be added to all scene tokens that share its alliance.

DamageTaken.Description:
Automatically remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.enQieRrITuEQZxx2]{Selfish Shield}'s effect after taking damage. Additionally, add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.2a6fuugiPpICe3Li]{Effect: Champion's Extra Damage} effect automatically. The source of the damage must be targeted after the effect is added in order to work correctly.

If the trigger target has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MRMW0EiuOO20pzG2]{Ongoing Selfishness}, its effect will be added automatically as well.
DamageTaken.Note: Trigger Trove Note An effect for Selfish Shield's extra damage has been added! Target the source of the damage to activate it.

Ally.Description: If the attacker has the Shared Stratagem auxiliary effect and the target is the Devise a Stratagem target, remove the auxiliary effect if they miss on their attack. If the attack is rerolled into a success, add the effect back.

Investigator.ChatMessage:
Trigger Trove Note Drag this effect onto the designated ally for Shared Stratagem!

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.u6Czd41XiuFK70J3]{Aux Effect: Shared Stratagem}
Investigator.Description: Apply a marker effect to the investigator's Devise a Stratagem target. Then post a message to chat with an effect to drag onto the designated ally. The attack target will be off-guard to the designated allies' next attack.

DamageTaken.Description: If the damage origin has the Shared Stratagem auxiliary effect and the target is the Devise a Stratagem target, remove both the auxiliary and trigger effects.

AttackRolled.Description:
Roll @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZL97DcoJ8us6EwAF]{Shields of the Spirit}'s damage when an ally is attacked while they are in the champion's aura. The champion must have the spell's effect on them.

Alternatively, roll damage if the target ally is not within the champion's aura, but does have the Shields of the Spirit (Security) effect on them.

Reduce the duration of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9p28s0zg4Vv4r5i2]{Spike Skin}'s effect by 1 minute each time the user is hit by an attack that deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.

Note: Due to a current limitation, this trigger will only work when the primary damage type is bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing. This covers most cases, but be aware that some instances of the previously mentioned damage types will be missed.

TurnStarted.Description:
When a creature starts their turn and they have a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yHujiDQPdtXW797e]{Spirit Link} auxiliary effect that originated from themselves, then check scene tokens for other creatures with an identical effect. If there is such a creature, check if they're not at their Hit Point maximum and if so, send a damage-healing-hybrid roll to chat for both parties of spirit link to apply to themselves.

For this trigger to work properly, you must add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.rn7KiPMH6u7C6mUD]{Aux Effect: Spirit Link} to the spell's description and drag it from the spell's chat card to both the spellcaster and the target.

If a character in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7PjBANpMMoBxTYq3]{Steam Knight} stance starts their turn and there's an enemy within their kinetic aura, roll damage automatically, including a reminder note of the free action they can use to deal this damage, and the necessary saving throw.
TurnStarted.Note: Steam Knight F At the start of each of your turns, you can emit steam as a free action. It deals fire damage to each creature in your kinetic aura with a @Check[reflex|against:kineticist|basic|options:area-effect,forced-movement|traits:composite,fire,impulse,kineticist,primal,stance,water] save. A creature that fails is also pushed 5 feet.

AuraEntered.Description: Post the Stench ability when a creature enters the aura.

TurnStarted.Description: Post the Stench ability when a creature starts its turn in the aura.
When a character using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NHheDmNB7L4REmlr]{Swaggering Initiative} is the first one to take a turn in combat, they receive panache.

AttackRolled.Description: Remove Panache's effect when a finisher misses. If the attack is rerolled into a success, grant Panache back to enable finisher damage.

DamageTaken.Description: Remove Panache's effect from damage origin when finisher damage is dealt.

AttackRolled.Description: When a character with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dWbISC0di0r4oPCi]{Sword and Pistol} makes a successful ranged Strike against an enemy within their reach—as indicated by the toggle in their sheet—with a one-handed firearm or crossbow, an auxiliary effect is added that makes the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to their next melee attack with a one-handed melee weapon. A trigger effect is also added to the target of this attack for tracking purposes.

DamageTaken.Description: When a character with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dWbISC0di0r4oPCi]{Sword and Pistol} deals damage with a one-handed melee weapon to an enemy that was off-guard as a result of that feat, remove the auxiliary effect on the attacker, and the trigger effect on the target.

AttackRolled.Description: Checks if attacking creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.4DYFJ4TUsNkgFBDb]{Taunted}, if so it then checks if the attack target is creature is a creature other than the origin of Taunt. If so, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} is applied to the attacking creature until start of its next turn.

AuraEntered.Description: Roll a kineticist's Thermal Nimbus damage when a creature enters their kinetic aura while their stance is active.

TurnStarted.Description: Roll a kineticist's Thermal Nimbus damage when a creature ends their turn in their kinetic aura while their stance is active.

Item.Note: A damaging effect that affects all targets within your space destroys all of the mirrors.

AttackRolled.Description:
If the attacked creature has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.SlgTXSJRSL5UplfQ]{Aux Effect: Trickster's Mirrors}, automatically reduce the Trickster's Mirrors resource depending on both the outcome of the attack and a randomly generated number, as described by the spell. If the attacker is within 5 feet, roll damage when a mirror is destroyed.

It's recommended that the auxiliary effect is added to the spell's description for easy access.

Note.Hit: Trickster's Mirror The attack hits you! All your mirrors remain.
Note.Miss: The attack misses you! One of your mirrors is destroyed. If the attacker was within 5 feet, they must succeed at a @Check[will|basic|options:item:type:spell|traits:animist,focus,illusion,mental,visual] save or take mental damage as they believe themselves cut by a shower of glass shards from the breaking mirror.

DamageTaken.Description: When a character with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4f65nrWVzTG8Njj8]{Unbalancing Blow} deals critical hit damage, the target becomes off-guard against the character's attacks until the end of their next turn.
When a creature takes damage from an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VXA50vhIRCBt4vvP]{Unbalancing Finisher}, it is off-guard until the end of the origin's next turn.

Item.Addendum: Anytime you cast a vitality spell, the thorns' damage increases to d6s of piercing damage until the start of your next turn.

AttackRolled.Description: Roll @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.nnSipUPNd3sm5vYL]{Vibrant Thorns}' damage when the recipient of the spell is hit with an unarmed attack, or a melee attack by an adjacent creature.

When a character with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.LwQb7ryTC8FlOXgX]{Vitalizing} rune critically hits an undead, that undead becomes enfeebled 1 until the end of that character's next turn.

If the character has a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.oVrVzML63VFvVfKk]{Greater Vitalizing} rune, that character becomes enfeebled 1 and stupefied 1 instead.

If a character affected by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.D4kArD91fFiREvC6]{Warning Stripes}, as determined by the presence of its auxiliary effect, is hit with a melee unarmed attack, roll the spell's damage.

For this trigger to work, the spell recipient needs @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-trigger-trove.auxiliary-items.Item.0qQV2XvX2kaOt8yj]{Aux Effect: Warning Stripes} applied to them. This effect must be linked in the spell's description for ease of access and to set the correct origin data on it.

DamageTaken.Description: Automatically remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.UtINSoEJ0u630ia4]{Warping Pull}'s effect after damage is taken
